Committee

Patient Population
Patient Population

1. Please identify patient populations
1. Please identify patient populations

that are appropriate targets for treatment studies (consider attributes such as stage of disease,viral genotype, co-morbidities, lamivudine resistance, IFN-experience, pediatrics,HBeAg-/HBV DNA+)? Please Include demographics in your discussion, ie.race and ethnicity.

such as stage of disease,viral

discussion, ie.race and ethnicity.
